comment: New update works brilliantly! Love this app!
title: Happy
replyText:
Hey Jessica,
We are sorry to hear that this issue is preventing an awesome experience with Wattpad. We would love to help you out. If this issue is still occurring, please go to support.wattpad.com and submit a request regarding this issue.
Thank you!

comment: Yeah It's Awesome i can Read A Story without a internet connection. But I do have A Problem In Scrolling. please fix the Prolem as soon as Possible. :)) Thank You
title: Great

comment: This app is wonderful! It lets users read and make books that can enhance their writing and vocabulary..but I would like to ask a suggestion(if possible) , if you could add a quick dictionary whenever people highlight a specific word in a story? Maybe similar to wattpad in IOS apps that pops a "define" button? i was wondering if you could add this.. because for some readers, they may find it hard to understand unfamiliar words. But overall,im satisfied with this app:)
title: Amazing.

comment: Whenever I change profile pics, my pic won't change in the left side menu like I updated it to be. Just a minor thing though xD [UPDATE]: So there's this difficulty I get when I scroll down lists (fan lists, reading lists, etc.) I only reach like, 1/8 of the list and couldn't see the rest. Please fix it? Overall, still a good app â˜…
